pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Inference using Integrated Nested Laplace Approximation // Facilitates spatial modeling using integrated nested Laplace approximation via the INLA package (http://www.r-inla.org). Additionally, implements a log Gaussian Cox process likelihood for modeling univariate and spatial point processes based on ecological survey data. See Yuan Yuan, Fabian E. Bachl, Finn Lindgren, David L. Borchers, Janine B. Illian, Stephen T. Buckland, Havard Rue, Tim Gerrodette (2017), arXiv:1604.06013.
